title: [1.7.10]SummerMods-全盛时期[永久更新]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 502508462 于 2019-6-6 20:37 编辑 
简介简单的说就是作者想增加diversity
Summer Mods comes from a minecraft server, under development. He proposes to have access to his mod. And want to make a mod that also allowed to play an adventure by adding weapons, armor and others. He will grow as he moves forward. He wants to offer the most diversity, and weapons more or less peter.(Summer Mods来自于一个MC服务器,正在开发中.他建议进入他的mod。并想做一个mod，也允许发挥冒险增加武器，盔甲和其他。他会随着前进而成长。他想提供最多样化的武器或多或少peter。)标红的是机翻

汉化
因为此mod还是及其早期的版本（19-05-25创建），内容不是很多，是个人应该看得懂item.itemIngot.name=Ingot of Summium
item.sword.name=Sword of Summium
item.pickaxe.name=Pickaxe of Summium
item.dagger.name=Dagger of the underworld
tile.ore.name=Ore of Summium
tile.block.name=Block of Summium
itemGroup.summer_creative_tabs=SummerMods
item.helmet.name=Summium Helmet
item.chestPlate.name=Summium ChestPlate
item.leggings.name=Summium Leggings
item.boots.name=Summium Boots复制代码Summium大概是summer的拉丁文
更新日志- All recipes have been added.
- The generation of the mine has been added.
- The Mineraie do this to get a summery ingot.
